thread.title: Facebook CEO exits Senate testimony with few scars

title: Facebook CEO exits Senate testimony with few scars
text:
Facebook CEO exits Senate testimony with few scars Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 02:16 
Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg's first-ever Congressional testimony went so well that shares of the social media giant saw their biggest one-day percentage gain since April 2016. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg's first-ever Congressional testimony went so well that shares of the social media giant saw their biggest one-day percentage gain since April 2016.
